metadata.name: Modular Crawlers and Kicks
metadata.description:
This premium sample pack from Slam Academy & James Patrick includes 225 modular synthesis sounds, one-shots, and squiggles. Each sound is delivered as a 48K, 24 bit AIFF audio file.

Every sound in the pack was made entirely with the modular system in Slam Academy's Studio B Synth Lab. Modules from Make Noise, Mutable Instruments, Malekko, Intellijel, and others as well as the Humble Audio Quad Operator FM module were used as a sound source. Random Sequences sprinkle rhythmic variation to these devices to create a unique library of patterns, one-shots, and sound FX.

Slam Academy sample packs come with full quality WAV files and include a full copyright transfer. The present owner is also able to receive:
• The Slam Academy Membership Pass: Includes access to all of our online and in-person classes. Including our library of pre-recorded classes, events, and workshops available only to members.
• Access to weekly online lab sessions with our instructors.
• Unlimited studio time in our Minneapolis, Minnesota (USA) studio complex.
• Mastering sessions for all projects that use at least one sample from this library at our Minneapolis studio complex (can be done remotely)
• Music Business/Career Advising Session (over Zoom, up to 60 minutes)
• Access to the Slam Academy Discord Group

attributes.value: Owner can receive support from the original creator.
Owner is able to publish work created with this pack.
